entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High 10. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Periods of rain beginning overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain showers. Risk of freezing rain and a thunderstorm early in the morning. Risk of a thunderstorm in the morning and afternoon. Local rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
